title: The Aeroplane
author: Grahame-White, Claude, 1879-1959; Harper, Harry, 1880-1960

quoteFirst: Meanwhile, in such circumstances and under such conditions, the deployment of the Battle Fleet had been carried through.  It was not until
quoteLast: that Admiral Jellicoe received definite confirmation from Admiral Beatty as to the position of the High Seas Fleet; and, two minutes later, still on a course southeast by east, he ordered the Fleet to deploy into line of battle on the port {192} wing column, at the same time reducing speed to 14 knots in order to allow the battle-cruisers to pass ahead.
title: The Heroic Record of the British Navy: A Short History of the Naval War, 1914-1918
author: Hurd, Archibald, 1869-1959; Bashford, H. H. (Henry Howarth), Sir, 1880-1961
